item.title: Version 1.0.1
item.description:
## What's Changed * feat: lower minimum deployment target to macOS 15 by @fouteox in https://github.com/fadogen/app/pull/1
## New Contributors * @fouteox made their first contribution in https://github.com/fadogen/app/pull/1
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fadogen/app/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1
